quizItems.question: Which of these Statoil-countries exports the most coffee on a yearly basis? (i.e we can have a little Subsidiary in that country called Statcaff or CoffOil)
What is the current best guess of the subduction rate in the area where Statoil holds acreage in New Zealand since start of Miocene, i.e last 20 million years?
Which is the most successful type of stratigraphical trap according to GCQ and the inhouse statistics over the last years?
The Pre Salt play is hot in Basil these days, but what is the age of the salt?
How can you tell that this person is a geologist?
alternatives: He has a rock proof glasses
He finds the rock more interesting than the opposite sex

quizItems.question: What is the name of the new amazing mega wow wow yeah yeah super duper collaboration software that we will have?
What hydrocarbon type was expected to be found the AD-10  Block in Myanmar?
What was the outcome of the pre salt round in Brazil that was just finished?
alternatives: Statoil representative went to the wc and missed the 10 minute bidding
Statoil emptied it’s pockets and made a successful bid
Statoil tried it’s best but failed miserably

quizItems.question: How many tcf’s of gas has been discovered in Area 1 & 4 held by Anadarco, Eni and others off shore Mozambique?
What mineral are bananas generally thought to be a good source for? (although not necessarily true)
What is the name of the Basin in India where Statoil was partner in a licence that made a big discovery, until about 2010-ish?
Indonesia is a huge country comprising over 13 000 islands and many basins onshore and offshore. How many basins has a proven petroleum system in Indonesia?
What peculiar geological feature can be seen in the shallower part on this 3D broadband seismic line?
How many deep water (>500 m wd) exploration wells have been drilled in the Ceduna Basin?
Which famous geological site is this picture from?
alternatives: Avaldsnes, west coast Norway close to Utsira

quizItems.question: How many kilometers is the strike slip offset along the Sea Gap fault in Block 2 Tanzania in Saffron time?
What is the HC column height in the Pao discovery?
What is this very common diagram called that is used to differentiate between different source rock types?
Which one of these wells is not a discovery in Block 2 Tanzania?
How many exploration wells have Statoil drilled this year until now and what is the success rate in %? Uncommercial discoveries not counted as success
